Hackfury - Decentralized Audit Organisation

Register on our platform:

As an auditor you gain reputation making security audits and help customers release versions of their products
As a product owner you request audits, and accept audits from auditors trusted by community.



Submit audit report metadata to blockchain

After auditor finishes audit - it submits audit metadata to blockchain:
Customer address, link to report, code version audited etc.






Tip auditor with reputation point

Trusted auditors can tip other auditors with repuation.
For example, Trail of Bits can confirm that some auditor is good - that auditor reputation will raise




Sign report

Customer signs final report - confirmes that all metadata stored in blockchain is OK


Claim bonus

Auditor can claim ether locked in the report after a year without any related issues found
